channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-6966] More fixes for TestCliDriver on Windows
item.description: This prevents the Test*CliDriver tests from compiling properly.
item.summary: More fixes for TestCliDriver on Windows

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Have a few more Windows-specific fixes for TestCliDriver, will also add here

Patch v1:

  • escape hiveConfDir when generating Test*CliDriver
  • Fix log4j file scheme on Windows (file:/ instead of file://)
  • Add HADOOP_HOME/bin to PATH when running tests on Windows to fix issues with resolving native libs.

+1.
I verified that this patch make compile in itests folder work.

Overall: -1 at least one tests failed

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12641575/HIVE-6966.1.patch

ERROR: -1 due to 41 failed/errored test(s), 5418 tests executed
Failed tests:

ATTACHMENT ID: 12641575
The test failures noted here seem to not be related to the patch. jdere, could you please verify/confirm? I can go ahead and commit it after that.
These failures do not look related, they appear to be the list of failing tests on hadoop-2 at the time. Most of these should be resolved by now, we can re-run the tests if you want.
This has been fixed in 0.14 release. Please open new jira if you see any issues.
